data.name: RGB Colour changer
data.description:
# Introduction

Jon has an RGB colour (in hex form), such as `#ABC123`

The RGB hex `#ABC123` is structured in the following way:

`#` is the Hex Identifier  
`AB` is the amount of Red  
`C1` is the amount of Green  
`23` is the amount of Blue

# Your task

Help Jon construct a function that changes the given Hex-String to a new one which is slightly lighter / darker. It takes two parameters:

`rgb` is the Hex-String of the RGB colour (may be lowercase or uppercase)

`percent` is the percentage by which to make it darker. Negative percentages should make it lighter. If this **parameter is not supplied**, you should default to **10%**. (**Standard rounding** should be used when calculating `percent` changes)

# Important Notes
-The output must be a lowercase Hex-String  
-The output must be a valid RGB-Hex (as described above)
